blocks-header--theme-dark.title: Yandex Cloud Professionals partner program
blocks-header--theme-dark.description: Sell Yandex Cloud services and get a monthly partner bonus ranging from 12% to 20% of your customers' spending on the services. Get grants to try out Yandex Cloud services or implement your customers' pilot projects.
